agent_utterance: Nice work initiating your pause. Here’s a tiny, ultra-simple next step to nudge you toward waiting before eating: after your 15-minute pause, if the urge still feels strong, switch to a 10-minute grounding block before deciding on food. After the block, log your urge again and decide: snack, wait a bit longer, or choose the grounding activity again. If the urge remains high, extend the block or repeat it once more. The goal is to keep structure, reduce impulsive eating, and move you closer to your target behavior.
